results.rule_description: Ensure AKS cluster has Network Policy configured
results.impact: No network policy is protecting the AKS cluster
results.resolution: Configure a network policy
results.description: Kubernetes cluster does not have a network policy set.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS cluster has Network Policy configured
results.impact: No network policy is protecting the AKS cluster
results.resolution: Configure a network policy
results.description: Kubernetes cluster does not have a network policy set.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS has an API Server Authorized IP Ranges enabled
results.impact: Any IP can interact with the API server
results.resolution: Limit the access to the API server to a limited IP range
results.description: Cluster does not limit API access to specific IP addresses.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS has an API Server Authorized IP Ranges enabled
results.impact: Any IP can interact with the API server
results.resolution: Limit the access to the API server to a limited IP range
results.description: Cluster does not limit API access to specific IP addresses.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS logging to Azure Monitoring is Configured
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for AKS
results.description: Cluster does not have logging enabled via OMS Agent.

results.rule_description: Ensure AKS logging to Azure Monitoring is Configured
results.impact: Logging provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable logging for AKS
results.description: Cluster does not have logging enabled via OMS Agent.

results.rule_description: Ensure RBAC is enabled on AKS clusters
results.impact: No role based access control is in place for the AKS cluster
results.resolution: Enable RBAC
results.description: Cluster has RBAC disabled

results.rule_description: Ensure RBAC is enabled on AKS clusters
results.impact: No role based access control is in place for the AKS cluster
results.resolution: Enable RBAC
results.description: Cluster has RBAC disabled

results.rule_description: Web App has registration with AD enabled
results.impact: Interaction between services can't easily be achieved without username/password
results.resolution: Register the app identity with AD
results.description: App service does not have an identity type.

results.rule_description: App Service authentication is activated
results.impact: Anonymous HTTP requests will be accepted
results.resolution: Enable authentication to prevent anonymous request being accepted
results.description: App service does not have authentication enabled.

results.rule_description: Web App uses the latest HTTP version
results.impact: Outdated versions of HTTP has security vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Use the latest version of HTTP
results.description: App service does not have HTTP/2 enabled.

results.rule_description: Web App accepts incoming client certificate
results.impact: Mutual TLS is not being used
results.resolution: Enable incoming certificates for clients
results.description: App service does not have client certificates enabled.

results.rule_description: Web App uses latest TLS version
results.impact: The minimum TLS version for apps should be TLS1_2
results.resolution: The TLS version being outdated and has known vulnerabilities
results.description: App service does not require a secure TLS version.

results.rule_description: Roles limited to the required actions
results.impact: Open permissions for subscriptions could result in an easily compromisable account
results.resolution: Use targeted permissions for roles
results.description: Role definition uses wildcard action with all scopes.

results.rule_description: Password authentication should be disabled on Azure virtual machines
results.impact: Using password authentication is less secure that ssh keys may result in compromised servers
results.resolution: Use ssh authentication for virtual machines
results.description: Linux virtual machine allows password authentication.

results.rule_description: Password authentication should be disabled on Azure virtual machines
results.impact: Using password authentication is less secure that ssh keys may result in compromised servers
results.resolution: Use ssh authentication for virtual machines
results.description: Linux virtual machine allows password authentication.

results.rule_description: Enable disk encryption on managed disk
results.impact: Data could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Enable encryption on managed disks
results.description: Managed disk is not encrypted.

results.rule_description: Ensure that no sensitive credentials are exposed in VM custom_data
results.impact: Sensitive credentials in custom_data can be leaked
results.resolution: Don't use sensitive credentials in the VM custom_data
results.description: Virtual machine includes secret(s) in custom data.

results.rule_description: Secret/sensitive data should not be exposed in plaintext.
results.impact: Sensitive data can be leaked to unauthorised people or systems.
results.resolution: Remove plaintext secrets and encrypt them within a secrets manager instead.
results.description: Attribute name appears sensitive and has a value which is defined within the project.

results.rule_description: Data Factory should have public access disabled, the default is enabled.
results.impact: Data factory is publicly accessible
results.resolution: Set public access to disabled for Data Factory
results.description: Data factory allows public network access.

results.rule_description: Unencrypted data lake storage.
results.impact: Data could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Enable encryption of data lake storage
results.description: Data lake store is not encrypted.

results.rule_description: Ensure the Function App can only be accessed via HTTPS. The default is false.
results.impact: Anyone can access the Function App using HTTP.
results.resolution: You can redirect all HTTP requests to the HTTPS port.
results.description: Function app does not have HTTPS enforced.

results.rule_description: Key vault Secret should have a content type set
results.impact: The secret's type is unclear without a content type
results.resolution: Provide content type for secrets to aid interpretation on retrieval
results.description: Secret does not have a content-type specified.

results.rule_description: Ensure that the expiration date is set on all keys
results.impact: Long life keys increase the attack surface when compromised
results.resolution: Set an expiration date on the vault key
results.description: Key should have an expiry date specified.

results.rule_description: Key Vault Secret should have an expiration date set
results.impact: Long life secrets increase the opportunity for compromise
results.resolution: Set an expiry for secrets
results.description: Secret should have an expiry date specified.

results.rule_description: Key vault should have purge protection enabled
results.impact: Keys could be purged from the vault without protection
results.resolution: Enable purge protection for key vaults
results.description: Vault does not have purge protection enabled.

results.rule_description: Key vault should have the network acl block specified
results.impact: Without a network ACL the key vault is freely accessible
results.resolution: Set a network ACL for the key vault
results.description: Vault network ACL does not block access by default.

results.rule_description: Enable disk encryption on managed disk
results.impact: Data could be read if compromised
results.resolution: Enable encryption on managed disks
results.description: Managed disk is not encrypted.

results.rule_description: SSL should be enforced on database connections where applicable
results.impact: Insecure connections could lead to data loss and other vulnerabilities
results.resolution: Enable SSL enforcement
results.description: Database server does not have enforce SSL.

results.rule_description: Ensure databases are not publicly accessible
results.impact: Publicly accessible database could lead to compromised data
results.resolution: Disable public access to database when not required
results.description: Database server has public network access enabled.

results.rule_description: Ensure the activity retention log is set to at least a year
results.impact: Short life activity logs can lead to missing records when investigating a breach
results.resolution: Set a retention period that will allow for delayed investigation
results.description: Profile has a log retention policy of less than 1 year.

results.rule_description: Ensure the activity retention log is set to at least a year
results.impact: Short life activity logs can lead to missing records when investigating a breach
results.resolution: Set a retention period that will allow for delayed investigation
results.description: Profile has a log retention policy of less than 1 year.

results.rule_description: Ensure log profile captures all activities
results.impact: Log profile must capture all activity to be able to ensure that all relevant information possible is available for an investigation
results.resolution: Configure log profile to capture all activities
results.description: Log profile does not require the 'Write' category.

results.rule_description: Ensure log profile captures all activities
results.impact: Log profile must capture all activity to be able to ensure that all relevant information possible is available for an investigation
results.resolution: Configure log profile to capture all activities
results.description: Log profile does not require the 'Delete' category.

results.rule_description: Ensure activitys are captured for all locations
results.impact: Activity may be occurring in locations that aren't being monitored
results.resolution: Enable capture for all locations
results.description: Log profile does not log to all regions (68 regions missing).

results.rule_description: Ensure activitys are captured for all locations

results.description: Log profile does not log to all regions (66 regions missing).

results.rule_description: No threat detections are set
results.impact: Disabling threat alerts means you are not getting the full benefit of server security protection
results.resolution: Use all provided threat alerts
results.description: Server has a security alert policy which disables alerts.

results.rule_description: Auditing should be enabled on Azure SQL Databases
results.impact: Auditing provides valuable information about access and usage
results.resolution: Enable auditing on Azure SQL databases
results.description: Server does not have an extended audit policy configured.

results.rule_description: Ensure databases are not publicly accessible
results.impact: Publicly accessible database could lead to compromised data
results.resolution: Disable public access to database when not required
results.description: Database server has public network access enabled.

results.rule_description: Database auditing rentention period should be longer than 90 days
results.impact: Short logging retention could result in missing valuable historical information
results.resolution: Set retention periods of database auditing to greater than 90 days
results.description: Server has a retention period of less than 90 days.

results.impact: Nobody will be prompty alerted in the case of a threat being detected
results.resolution: Provide at least one email address for threat alerts
results.description: Security alert policy does not include any email addresses for notification.

results.impact: Administrators and subscription owners may have a delayed response
results.resolution: Enable email to subscription owners
results.description: Security alert policy does not alert account admins.

results.rule_description: RDP access should not be accessible from the Internet, should be blocked on port 3389
results.impact: Anyone from the internet can potentially RDP onto an instance
results.resolution: Block RDP port from internet
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress to RDP port from multiple public internet addresses.

results.rule_description: An outbound network security rule allows traffic to /0.
results.impact: The port is exposed for egress to the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows egress to public internet.

results.rule_description: An inbound network security rule allows traffic from /0.
results.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

results.rule_description: An inbound network security rule allows traffic from /0.
results.impact: The port is exposed for ingress from the internet
results.resolution: Set a more restrictive cidr range
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress from public internet.

results.rule_description: Retention policy for flow logs should be enabled and set to greater than 90 days
results.impact: Not enabling retention or having short expiry on flow logs could lead to compromise being undetected limiting time for analysis
results.resolution: Ensure flow log retention is turned on with an expiry of >90 days
results.description: Flow log has a log retention policy of less than 90 days.

results.rule_description: SSH access should not be accessible from the Internet, should be blocked on port 22
results.impact: Its dangerous to allow SSH access from the internet
results.resolution: Block port 22 access from the internet
results.description: Security group rule allows ingress to SSH port from multiple public internet addresses.

results.impact: The ability to react to high severity notifications could be delayed
results.resolution: Set alert notifications to be on
results.description: Security contact has alert notifications disabled.

results.rule_description: Enable the standard security center subscription tier
results.impact: Using free subscription does not enable Azure Defender for the resource type
results.resolution: Enable standard subscription tier to benefit from Azure Defender
results.description: Security center subscription uses the free tier.

results.rule_description: The required contact details should be set for security center
results.impact: Without a telephone number set, Azure support can't contact
results.resolution: Set a telephone number for security center contact
results.description: Security contact does not have a phone number listed.

results.rule_description: Synapse Workspace should have managed virtual network enabled, the default is disabled.
results.impact: Your Synapse workspace is not using the private endpoints
results.resolution: Set manage virtual network to enabled
results.description: Workspace does not have a managed virtual network enabled.
